description:
🎙️ In the freshest episode of the Cybernews podcast, we deep-dive into the Ticketmaster breach debacle, debate the ongoing issues at Google, and analyze potential Russian hacker threats during the Paris Olympics

Check out our regular weekly podcasts here: https://open.spotify.com/show/08yjUTmHb9rtvqDHxTjWhR?si=a032eef08ed44b78

0:00 - Intro
01:37 - Ticketmaster breach, a lesson we all need
12:47 - Google in hot water once again
33:40 - Tom Cruise doesn’t love the Paris Olympics
45:57 - Cyberbunker for sale in Germany

Sources:
https://cybernews.com/news/ticketmaster-breach-confirmed-third-party-blamed/
https://cybernews.com/news/snowflake-distances-from-ticketmaster-breach/
https://cybernews.com/news/ticketmaster-data-breach-class-action-lawsuit-live-nation/
https://cybernews.com/news/google-leak-exposes-privacy-breaches/
https://www.washingtonpost.com/politics/2024/05/29/google-ai-overview-wrong-answers-unfixable/
https://cybernews.com/news/fake-tom-cruise-undermining-paris-olympics
title: Russia's Fake AI Tom Cruise, Ticketmaster Breach & Taylor Swift Fans | Cybernews Podcast

description:
🧨 Grab the best way to make a website - Hostinger WordPress and Builder combo!! 🧨

✅ Shopify - for large online stores - Get a Discount! ➡️ https://cnews.link/get-shopify/DkozcoAdAt8/


How to make a website - a question that seemingly should have a straightforward answer. But once you dig into it, you realize how many different users and projects there actually are. Suddenly, that one question has 50 sub-questions… and that's why I'm here. I want to help you decide what you want, what you need, and what's the best website builder tool for achieving your dream website…

🤖 What website are you building?

If you want a simple, representative website with minimal new content, like a local barber or event, a website builder will be optimal. For a blog or a more complex website with complete control over how it looks or works - use WordPress. If you just want to have a blog to share
title: Learn How to Make a Website!
